show_name: Uchi Tama?! Uchi no Tama Shirimasen ka?
other_title: Uchitama?! Have you seen my Tama?
うちタマ?!~うちのタマ知りませんか?~
ending_theme: #01: "Hidamari wo Sagashite (ひだまりを探して)" by Tama Okamoto (Souma Saitou) (ep 1)
#03: "Itsumo Itsumo no Sanpomichi (いつもいつもの散歩道)" by Pochi Yamada (Kensho Ono) (ep 3)
#04: "Sanchoume no Hoshi☆ (三丁目の星☆)" by Kuro Mikawa (Yuuichirou Umehara) (ep 4)
#05: "UP TO DATE!" by Tora Kiso (Yuusuke Shirai) (ep 5)
#06: "Inu Neko Ellery (犬猫エレジー)" by Gon Noda (Wataru Hatano) (ep 6)
#08: "Nante Koto nai Uta (なんてことない唄)" by Nora (Yuki Kaji) (ep 8)
#09: "Play with me...?" by Koma Oketani (Tomoyo Kurosawa) (ep 9)
#10: "Hallelujah Hallelujah (ハレルヤ・ハレルヤ)" by Beh Kawara (Yuuma Uchida) (ep 10)
#11: "Sanchoume no Theme (三丁目のテーマ)" by Sanchoume All Stars (三丁目オールスターズ) (ep 11)
